Add/Replace/Delete.Description: The ADD/Delete/Replace modifiers are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

BackUp.Description: This attribute is used to check whether the system takes a backup before import or not.
BackUp.Name: BackUp

Combine.Description: This is used to specify whether to total/combine values for duplicate records based on a condition.
Combine.Name: Combine

Empty.Description: This attribute discards a particular record based on condition.
Empty.Name: Empty

Excel Sheet Name.Description: This attribute is used to capture the name of the Excel sheet.
Excel Sheet Name.Name: Excel Sheet Name

Field.Description: This attribute specifies the field name to be imported and the associated width.

Meta.Aliases: Field, Fields, Left Field, Left Fields

Field.Name: Field

Format.Description: Specifies the format of the file to be imported.
Format.Name: Format

Full Object.Description: To Specify Entire object to be imported or Not.
Full Object.Name: Full Object

JSONTag.Description: To specify the tag name in the exported XML file.
JSONTag.Name: JSONTag

Local Formula.Description: This is used to specify a local formula within the Import File Definition.
Local Formula.Name: Local Formula

Modifies.Description: To modify the values while importing.
Modifies.Name: Modifies

Object.Description: Specifies the Import Object name which in turn is associated with an Internal Object.
Object.Name: Object

On.Description: On keyword is used to specify a list of actions to be executed on the occurance of an Event
On.Name: On

Option.Description: Option is an attribute which can be used by various definitions, to provide a conditional result in a program.
Option.Name: Option

Predefined Map.Description: This attribute is used to specify the complete location and name of Tally's predefined map file.
Predefined Map.Name: Predefined Map

Repeat.Description: To specify whether the import file contains repeated records or not.
Repeat.Name: Repeat

Response Report.Description: Specify name of the report which can be used for creating the Response XML. This will be used for creating response string for SOAP Requests.
Response Report.Name: Response Report

Set.Description: Modify or set the storage value while importing.
Set.Name: Set

Show Preview.Description: This attribute is used to check whether to show a preview or not.
Show Preview.Name: Show Preview

Space Bottom.Description: The attribute specifies the no of characters to be excluded from the end of the file.
Space Bottom.Name: Space Bottom

Space Top.Description: The attribute specifies the no of characters to be excluded from the beginning of  the file.
Space Top.Name: Space Top

Switch.Description: 'Switch' attribute is similar to the Option attribute but reduces code complexity and improves the performance. The Switch are grouped using a label Once a condition is satisfied from one group, switch won't  check further conditions from the same group.  It will evaluate the conditions from the other groups specified, if any.
Switch.Name: Switch

SyncRulesAfterSave.Description: After 'SAVE' the voucher, that voucher will sync with Server.
SyncRulesAfterSave.Name: SyncRulesAfterSave

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use

User Defined Map.Description: This attribute is used to specify the complete location and the name of the user-defined map file.
User Defined Map.Name: User Defined Map

Width.Description: Specifies the total size of one record.
Width.Name: Width

XSLT.Description: Specifies the XSLT file name for transformation while xml import.
XSLT.Name: XSLT
